data.name: Carry_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Our manager disappeared! He should be in snowbound path!

data.name: Carry_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Our manager disappeared! (You already have the quest)

data.name: Carry_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]Our manager's back! Yay!

data.name: Carry_Line_004
data.value: [tmp](Carry) We've got to do something about these thieves.

data.name: Carry_Line_005
data.value: [tmp](Carry) I feel unsafe until you take care of the criminal.

data.name: Carry_Line_006
data.value: [tmp](Carry) I still feel unsafe until you take care of the criminal.

data.name: Carry_Line_007
data.value: [tmp](Carry) You defeated the criminal?

data.name: Carry_Line_008
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Thank you and good luck with the summit!

data.name: Carry_Line_009
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Maybe we should aim for the summit ourselves.

data.name: Carry_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp](carry) I'm on my routine route in blizzard camp!

data.name: Conjurer_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Yeah, I think we need a new team name.

data.name: Conjurer_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]I can see the spirits of the ones who did not make the climb...

data.name: Deliver_Line_001
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Our manager disappeared! He should be in snowbound path!

data.name: Deliver_Line_002
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Our manager disappeared! (You already have the quest)

data.name: Deliver_Line_003
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Our manager's back! Yay!

data.name: Deliver_Line_004
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) We've got to do something about these thieves.

data.name: Deliver_Line_005
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) I feel unsafe until you take care of the criminal.

data.name: Deliver_Line_006
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) I still feel unsafe until you take care of the criminal.

data.name: Deliver_Line_007
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) You defeated the criminal?

data.name: Deliver_Line_008
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Thank you and good luck with the summit!

data.name: Deliver_Line_009
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Maybe we should aim for the summit ourselves.

data.name: Deliver_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp](deliver) I'm on my routine route in blizzard camp!

data.name: Dragon_Accept
data.value: [tmp]This is it, Flygon![br]All of our training has come to this!

data.name: Dragon_Decline
data.value: [tmp]Aww come on! We've got postgame movesets and everything!

data.name: Dragon_Fail_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Aww come on! You're better than that!

data.name: Dragon_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]We're helping Flygon master a new technique![br]But we need an experienced team on the other side.[br]Want to be our sparring partner?

data.name: Dragon_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]After defeating us, we reveal that we've taught Flygon Draco Meteor![br]We congratulate Flygon for finally pulling it off.

data.name: Dragon_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]We're proud of you!

data.name: Dragon_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]Aim for greater heights!

data.name: Dragon_Line_005
data.value: [tmp]You can do it!

data.name: Forbidden_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]We tend to stay away from the Champion's Path.[br]The fierce Pokemon there stand guard as if by duty.

data.name: Hint_Brother_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I tried to bring back someone from Glacial Path (later Barren Tundra), but I couldn't get all the way through...

data.name: Hint_Grandma_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I tried to bring back someone from Clouded Road (later The Sky), but I couldn't get all the way through...[br]This doesn't make any sense. My normal text talks about how we don't go to Champion's Road much less The Sky.[br]Why would I be there? Fix before release.

data.name: Rival_1_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I can't stand that zangoose! I can't let her get ahead of me!

data.name: Rival_2_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I can't stand that seviper! I can't let her get ahead of me!

data.name: Secluded_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]We've never had any visitors, except for the rumored ones that paved the path up north.

data.name: Seer_Complete_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]How did the search go?

data.name: Seer_Complete_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Boo.

data.name: Seer_Complete_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]IEEEEEEE![br]Ghostly apparition, begone!

data.name: Seer_Complete_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]Nah bro it's me, your partner!

data.name: Seer_Complete_Line_005
data.value: [tmp]Oh no! My visions were correct![br]You did not survive the trek up snowbound path after all!

data.name: Seer_Complete_Line_006
data.value: [tmp]Nah bro I just evolved. Something about that place did this.[br]I'm an example to the player that they can get Hisui evolutions if they evolve in Snowbound Path.

data.name: Seer_Complete_Line_007
data.value: [tmp]Oh.[br]K.[br]Also here's your reward.

data.name: Seer_Help_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Quilava and I were exploring Snowbound Path when we were separated.[br]Can you search for Quilava?

data.name: Seer_Help_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Hurry, I have an ominous premonition that my partner Quilava did not survive.

data.name: Seer_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Say, maybe we should change our direction as a team.

data.name: Seer_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]I see glimpses of your future![br]You have the potential to go as far as you want.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for apprehending the criminal, take this reward.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]We've got to do something about these thieves.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]We've got to do something about these thieves.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]We've foud the hideout of the other outlaw leader. We need your help to take them down!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_005
data.value: [tmp]The mountain bandits have loads of rare items at their disposal. Tread carefully.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_006
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for bringing down the criminal! We reward you with biggest storage bag!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_007
data.value: [tmp]This bad boy can hold even more food than me! dohohoho!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_008
data.value: We're all rooting for you![pause=0]\nBlaze the trail to that summit!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_009
data.value: [tmp]Maybe we should aim for the summit ourselves.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp]I'm on my routine route in blizzard camp!

data.name: Summit_Fail_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]No... They weren't the ones.

data.name: Summit_Fail_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]We must continue to wait...

data.name: Tutor_Accept
data.value: [tmp]Then let me pass on all that I've learned!

data.name: Tutor_Ask
data.value: [tmp]Do you want me to teach you {0}?

data.name: Tutor_Decline
data.value: [tmp]Come back if you change your mind!

data.name: Tutor_Intro
data.value: [tmp]I can teach {0} to any dragon type Pokemon that wants to learn!

data.name: Tutor_Taught
data.value: [tmp]It's a dangerous technique, use it wisely!
